renewable energy certificate.Relation: ENTITY2 is issued by renewable energy certificate
renewable energy certificate.Description: A renewable energy certificate is a document that certifies the production of a certain amount of renewable energy. ENTITY2 is issued by renewable energy certificate to verify the generation of renewable energy.

renewable energy certificate.Relation: ENTITY2 can be traded for renewable energy certificate
renewable energy certificate.Description: ENTITY2 can be traded in the market as a commodity representing the environmental attributes of renewable energy. It can be bought and sold to meet renewable energy targets.

renewable energy certificate.Relation: ENTITY2 helps in tracking renewable energy generation
renewable energy certificate.Description: Renewable energy certificate, like ENTITY2, plays a crucial role in tracking and documenting the production and consumption of renewable energy. It provides transparency and accountability in the renewable energy market.

renewable energy certificate.Relation: ENTITY2 supports the development of renewable energy projects
renewable energy certificate.Description: By purchasing ENTITY2, individuals or organizations contribute to the funding of renewable energy projects. The revenue generated from the sale of ENTITY2 can be used to finance the development of new renewable energy facilities.
